tweets.text: @andrewmeakin @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 She’s basically said at a meeting that they can’t do much in case they scare @RedIndustries2 off as there’s no plan B to pay for it & it’ll be a drawn out legal battle to even be allowed to take it off them. So apparently we are totally screwed @Cap_it_off #stopthestink
@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe well it should be almost stink free now on deadline day . https://t.co/KLKkfOOK2d

EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz

*This* is why we have a phosphate pollution problem in Herefordshire rivers. Massive pile of chicken muck dumped right next to watercourse. Completely against the farming rules for water. I’ve just reported it to @EnvAgency.  Totally unacceptable.  And not an isolated incident. https://t.co/1l45pAbllG

tweets.text: It feels like being in the middle of a nightmare horror film @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk and we are not in isolation. We stand with our friends #mullaghglass #biffawestmill @NotoLandfillMK and say NO MORE @StinkStopthe https://t.co/ikCE2ibGyD

On 4th March 2020 the First-teir Tribunal overruled a decision by EA & ICO not to provide Robert Latimer with data regarding the Whitburn sewage overflow.

1 year, 1 month & 26 days later he has still not received that information.

Why is that @EnvAgency, @ICOnews? https://t.co/wO5G8OTvfh

I never had a fear of odours before but I’m certainly developing one this week, can’t bear another night of this @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA #stopthestink https://t.co/spzFlxeANK

Maybe @ClareDinnisEA could consider staying over here sometime soon and smelling it herself for a length of time. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink https://t.co/yl71FtUnCf

The capping was supposed to address the outrageous levels of odour we have endured recently. If it turns out that it has not, it strengthens the case for:

(a) capping off the entire site
(b) moving to the restoration phase
(c) an inquiry into the EA's handling of the site (2/2)

Remember that 80s horror film #thefog well that's the best comparison to the nightmare residents in #lisburn #belfast #silverdale are having. Only we have an invisible gas invading our homes #mullaghglass #WalleysQuarry #environnement #airpollution @daera_ni @ErinBrockovich https://t.co/JoX2CAI9ql

There is a lot of suffering to answer for here. If you imagine that this hell hole and its toxic voice is something we will GET USED TO, you are very, very, wrong. @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids There Will Be A Reckoning
@StinkStopthe #StopTheStink https://t.co/SJRLoAswte

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You saying that you ‘saw progress today’ means nothing. The people of Newcastle under Lyme need to smell progress. No excuses, do your job and #StopTheStink

My kitchen, 2 miles away and up a hill from #WalleysQuarry, in Keele has suddenly been filled with the smell of landfill! @EnvAgencyMids sort it out! This is now a human rights issue! People can't enjoy their own homes. #StopTheStink

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids How can @PublicHealthEng say long term effects this is unprecedented. You said your self it’s the worst landfill  @EnvAgency have dealt with. They said may cause minor symptoms, daily headache sore throat dry itchy eyes is not minor

@SianieRoo @LoneRanger77777 @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 6am this morning. Driving through the Westlands and all the way through to the M6 jnct 15 it was horrendous. Unbearable stench.

Well thanks @channel5_tv news for covering the story of @RedIndustries2 Walleys Landfill Quarrey LTD, If this horror story is still being told in 2022,2023,2024, this Town will BE a ghost Town. @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe 
@EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency Immediate action #stopthestink

tweets.text: @annjsmall @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @PHE_uk So sorry you're suffering 😔 we'll stick together until it's sorted!!

@EleanorO16 @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @PHE_uk Yes it's horrendous,our family been categorised the same by GP, they will be able to pull the data whenever they are asked to prove the landfill is making us ill, everyone feeling ill from the stench should speak to gp.

We're now having GPs categorising children living next to @RedIndustries2 Walleys Quarry as suffering from the effects of environmental pollution 🤯 @EnvAgencyMids @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @PHE_uk this cannot go on!!! #stopthestink #LetOurChildrenBreathe

tweets.text:
There is 10 times more coral reef on the planet than chalk streams. 

The River Wandle is one of only two urban chalk streams in London.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/TSHThMTasv
@EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 😂😂😂😂😂😂 . oh sorry were you serious ? Somehow we don't believe you @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe
@RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk #StopTheStink https://t.co/qklfE552iq

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 EA this goes beyond a bit of tarp & a barrow full of soil, this is an environmental disaster on a catastrophic scale & needs addressing immediately as an emergency. This landfill is totally out of control & we are being systematically poisoned on a daily basis, close it down 😡

@hopeternalall @StinkStopthe I have really struggled today, it is severely impacting on my ability to concentrate and function and led to some upset this morning, when the stink remained. This cannot continue @EnvAgency
@Williamweb1 @nightmaresurrey @Guildford_Cons @EnvAgency I am sure that R4GV will be relieved to know that EA need not worry about the flood plains in #Guildford.
